website_summaries.verdict: The Moto Z3 Play's two-day battery life is great, but at its current price, it can't compete with the OnePlus 6.
pros: The Moto Z3 Play comes with an extra battery pack that gives it two-day battery life
Its take on Android 8.0 Oreo is a pleasure to use, and the fingerprint sensor on the phone's right side is easy to reach
cons: It's not water-resistant, and there's no headphone jack
It looks outdated with the mod on and costs about the same as faster phones with better specs

customer_reviews.title: Used as a developer phone ... Opinions from a developer standpoint.
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile Android and iPhone app developer (ADSNELLC Development) I find this Moto Z3 Play quite solid and reliable for use and app building and compiling software, even over Samsung products. My last 2 Android developer phones were all Samsung products (S4 & S6) and each phone developed pixel line problems in the screens after 2 years of use because of cheap components and potential for software corruption on Samsung's and battery drain is worse on Samsung than Motorola. I plan on developing mods and additional apps for Android and Motorola products. Forgot to mention this link is a case that WILL fit the phone and power Mod combined.
customer_reviews.author: ADSNELLC Development

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Battery Life / Cool Mods
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mid-range phone. Pulled my Straight Talk sim card out of my Straight Talk phone and put it in this one. Service transferred right over to the new phone. PROS: Battery life is amazing. GPS is accurate. Call quality is clear. Resolution is great. WiFi works well. Very responsive. Excellent graphics. So many cool mods that can be used with this phone. (Extra power, speakers, projector, etc.) CONS: The only issues I have with this phone are the missing UI settings. I am unable to get the screen to stop coming on automatically, and I can't turn on immersive mode. (Maybe there's an app to bypass these restrictions)
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Zuber

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: i love the size of the screen and the system runs very smoothly. camera and fingerprint scanner are great. however, I'm more than displeased with the performance of the battery. a ten-minute video call and half an hour of texting drops the power down to 70 %. this was with the data and location services off and power save mode on. without the battery mod, this phone would be a 300 dollar paperweight in about 6 hours. if not less. I'm a little wary of trying to use GPS on it to get anywhere without the charge cord for fear of being stranded after the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie94

customer_reviews.title: Camera... Eh. Overall, a win.
customer_reviews.text: Diehard Motorola fan. Replacing Moto X Pure with issues. Camera setup is not as nice, but overall value is good. Handset is substantial and we'll constructed. Haven't used Moto Mods battery yet, but it is charged and at the ready should the need arise. Overall happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if issues.
customer_reviews.text: The phone feels great once I added a bumper "case" to add more grip. However, the phone is dropping my mobile connection from time to time and not reconnecting on its own. I have to reboot the phone to connect again.This problem did not exist with the phone being replaced, Moto X Play. I have an email pending to Motorola to see what they say. Also, I know that the phone is ready for Pie but I have not received an update and currently set at Oreo. If things don't improve, I'll have to return this to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RickP

customer_reviews.title: Motorola Z3
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was bad because having power failore problem , the phone turning off every 10 minutes by him self, mike be spacific this one i dont know but was bad experiance for me as a first time motorola user, what i like is Amazon is the best serivice if you have a problem they take care of you very will. if i buy another Motorloa phone yes but probably future new models , Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Galstyan

customer_reviews.title: The phone I always wanted
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted this phone now that I have it I love ❤️ it! The biggest complaint is no separate headphone jack other than that whatever might be wrong is overshadowed by everything else be this phone does right.Every day I find more things I can do with this phone. And I love the mods. I want the projector mod and the high end camera lens mod. Everything I want at a great price. I'm going to buy another one for my wife. Very fast and great memory storage
customer_reviews.author: Worldwar3

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone
customer_reviews.text: My screen on this phone quit after 4 months. Nothing gets it working. and the fingerprint reader on the side was almost impossible to use. Do not buy this phone. I have ordered a G7 because my G5 worked so well and I thought the razor would be a good investment. I was wrong. The only reason I got the razor was because it could use Android pay. I do not recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry R.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The first phone in with a day boot log error. Replace . Replacement phone will not up date same problem had with first phone before error. Called support need to reset to factory spec . Problem in the middle of construction permit and need phone will try in a couple days don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: MOTO Z3 PLAY,,,,, A Good Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The Moto Z3 Play is great. I'm still trying to figure all of the Moto's programs and still loading new aps. I dumped my other phone for this one. It also was new but, a pain in the In my bottom. I literally trashed it after four months. This Moto walks all over my other one. Dumping my other $300.00 phone saved me from a stroke. I will rate the features as time goes on. JJr.
customer_reviews.author: JJStryyker

customer_reviews.title: It's not worth almost 500 dollars! I promise!
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked fine till my boyfriend had it in his pocket and sat down and it cracked the screen. He's only 125 pounds. Then about a month later the phone fell off his lap onto the floor(about a foot drop) and the screen went white completely. He also has a thick case on his phone. We had the phone for 4 months. I've never had a phone so crappy before. Now we are stuck with mods that can't be used for any other phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cerina F.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: as its previous generation, it is a solid phone, the 2 star rating is because this is an "amazon prime exclusive" moto, and the bootloader cannot be unlocked even though it has the cid: 0x0032 designation. moto support is zero help and gives up the moment you mention amazon. this is a real pissoff because i paid for a new phone, unbranded by any carrier, and it is STILL not unlockable. seems like you have to buy straight from motorola in order to get one that is rootable. i dont care about a warranty, i just want my android the way i want it to be. and if i am going to shell out the money, i want the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Canaday

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: My Moto X Pure Edition finally had battery issues n the screen was showing backlight burn thru so I ordered a new Moto Z3 Play with the Moto Mods Battery bundle. Absolutely satisfied with the new phones performance and features.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, it does Band71, the extra battery is wonderful. I usually am on 100% charge all day, with only the external battery cycling -- which means I can replace that when it eventually wears out and still have full battery life on the internal battery. I really like the moto mods also - just wish there was more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Griepentrog

customer_reviews.title: Great Motorola phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone before. Best phone for the price. The finger print scanner is in the perfect spot. The processor is great. The phone works very well and has fast processing. Also the bonus battery pack was an awesome thing to include. Works well for me and I use my phone for work.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and awesome
customer_reviews.text: runs great, extended battery covers a couple days of use. The thing is solid and so far has been one of my favorite phones, and for a low price :)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Got this January 5,2020 and the battery is already almost dead. Gets so hot you almost can't touch it. I almost never used this phone. I live alone, do not take it out of the house, never dropped or dinged in any way. I don't go online with it. Maybe a phone call 3 times a month. Very moderate texting. I'm in my sixties so I don't play on my phone. I'm worried it's going to blow up. It now goes nearly dead in about 16 hours after a charge, and that is with it not even being used. $250 down the drain. DO NOT BUY! One star because they make you.
customer_reviews.author: Docwormburner

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it he says it lasts a good 3 to 4 days without having to be charged, it's especially good when he's working or out on a travel trip, is easy to charge you just leave it on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jalisa Hickam

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, extreme value!
customer_reviews.text: After a month of extensive use,this has turned into my favorite Droid to date. The Moto Mods are a bit gimmicky, but they have become more affordable. The Motorola inter face took just a little bit of time to adjust to, but now I couldn't imagine going back to Samsung. Battery life has been superb! It came with a add-on Battey pack, but I've honestly never needed it nor used it. The processor has remained quick, even after loading it up with endless apps. The onboard memory has been a real luxury. Truly a great value at its current price point.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Spearson

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap and not updated to last Android, still with 8.1 which is the original software
customer_reviews.text: Thought it had andorid 9.0 and it didnt. Just went on discount after one month of buying it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Molina

customer_reviews.title: Going backwards
customer_reviews.text: This is no improvement over last year's model batteries about the same a little bit better but having the buttons mashed so close together next to the fingerprint reader that's just a poor poor poor design
customer_reviews.author: Rex Barker Ledon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, extra battery pack is fantastic. Doesn’t seem to have as good of an antenna, decreased range. Overall good phone. I’m partial to Motorola’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 months, but then battery issues.
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of it's specs, the audio and screen are good, as is the camera. However, it has only been 3 months and the battery is giving me issues. I did I timed how fast it dropped and in under 12 minutes it dropped from 100% down to 76%. This is unacceptable. This was not with heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Siempre fiel sin fin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Motorola is THE BEST phone company. I love Moto mods and hope so much that there are new ones made soon. The possibilities are endless, and in my mind, a phone without modular capabilities is very boring. The Z3 is an awesome phone at a super reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew l.

customer_reviews.title: Locked
customer_reviews.text: I would like to write a revised as to the quality of the phone. However, I cannot because the phone is locked and unable to be activated.
customer_reviews.author: harry hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z3 Play review
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, great value for price. Even came with battery attachment which my wife hasn't even needed given the internal battery life. Did alot of shopping before deciding on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Except for the battery life and the battery mod life being not quite as long as I was lead to believe, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Moto Mods.
customer_reviews.text: To make it short and sweet, this is the BEST phone for the money specialy if you add moto mods. I use the projector mod and it's so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: It has limited uses for me as can not transfer from iPhone and text does not seem to work all the time
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, good phone
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive phone (compared to others) great battery life with the battery pack, and more memory than my last phone. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: EBS Mama

customer_reviews.title: Motorola products are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Best price, good features. Love the slim design. Booster battery pack is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: bebe

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you get one?
customer_reviews.text: This phone is slick, stylish and tech of the future🤩 this phone was my very first choice when picking a phone, when it first came out I really wanted it but had to do iPhone, I hate iPhone so much But When I finally got the opportunity to get this phone I went for it totally worth 500 Great deal at $229.99 WITH A CHARGING MOD! Perfect for an avid photographer/hobbiest 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone that lasts two days with the battery mod. Been completely happy with it and works awesome on Straight Talk.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Responds and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love my new phone, easy to use and 5 g ready.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: New. As pictured, in factory box
customer_reviews.text: Worded on Verizon. Got what was pictured, new, in factory box
customer_reviews.author: QWERTY

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a great phone, but I lose my contacts maybe 3 times a week!
customer_reviews.author: taborah

customer_reviews.title: Expedited shipping would be beautiful in this case
customer_reviews.text: Moto phones are something I personally swear by. So is expedited shipping when I'm dealing with some second rate p.o.s. smart phone but for whatever reason Amazon doesn't offer this option. Cause you know who actually night needs a phone right away I can wait five or six days for it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box Motomods did not work on phone
customer_reviews.text: Received phone and did not set it up right away. Now the short return window has expired. I am left with a phone that cannot use the motomods. One of the reasons I purchased the phone was the ability to use extended battery mods. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vincent verrocchio

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was super pissed that this product did not come with a home charger the battery life with the extended battery is subpar
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Slippery thing
customer_reviews.text: I have never dropped phones before. There's something about the shape or something. I'm on my second Z3play...I like the battery life...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Starkie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and liability it's very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Is the best phone you can buy durable and good phone overall and reliable that's why I bought another one soon I broke my old one
customer_reviews.author: Roman valeriu

customer_reviews.text: As a user of Motorola Z phones, this one delivers as espected. Awesome processor and RAM . Only lack frontal flash, the enlightened screen, doesn't work! and the finger print reader its a bit uncomfortable for big fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Gasco

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Using fingerprint is difficult and sometimes battery drains fast. Everything else good
customer_reviews.author: arun raj deva

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone. Good solid phonr for the price.i wasnt disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: So far enjoying it more than my old z2 force. Bigger screen but doesn't fill when streaming or playing video playback. But solid phone
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Why spend 500 or more on newest phones. Does everything I need.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my z3 at better price than phone company wanted.
customer_reviews.author: curt carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to buy more mods
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome , everybody who has seen my phone wants one,especially when I take my battery mod off and reattach it
customer_reviews.author: mark j tate

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Fast phone, some bloatware but you can uninstall it. The Moto mods work great. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good paperweight!
customer_reviews.text: I used this phone for 4 days then it stopped working. It shut off during the night and will not come back on. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Stewart III

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought it after using a phone I had, had for nearly five years. Great size, good quality, great battery life. The camera quality isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be an unlocked phone. It is locked and I cannot get into it
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is good phone, even compared with iPhone xr. Battery is good for whole day. Size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rong wu

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality phone for the price! The battery mod add extra life.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy navigation
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone except for it tells me to restart all the time
customer_reviews.author: Charles e Scott jr

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I wanted at an amazingly great price .
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: If you had an Apple... Get another apple.
customer_reviews.text: Dear Lord how I loathe this phone. I hate the cluttered screen. I hate how complicated it is to take a photo and then look at the photo. I hate how complicated it is to send that photo to someone. I hate that you cannot use the extra battery pack and keep the protective cover on it at the same time. You get extra battery power OR you get to protect your phone. You don't get both. I hate that it is incredibly complicated to transfer your contacts to your new phone. I hate that it is impossible to get your photos from your old phone to your new phone. Wow, do I hate this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy battery, no audio port
customer_reviews.text: The battery is horrible. ... .. Just.. No. I got it because I loved my old phone that used the speaker that also works with this... And I was like HEY this has a battery with it.. Ya there is a reason for that. Also it has no headphone jack! Like with! I am an audiophile! Do not make me choose between charging my phone and my music. They don't mention that perfect in the description anywhere, and the pics leave that part of the phone out. It does come with a converter port, but not one that let's you charge it and use the your ear buds at the same time. That you have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Syrcis

customer_reviews.title: its a phone
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up with the transfer app. I replaced another Motorola phone so not a big learning curve. The battery mod give me enough juice for two or more days since I am not a power user. It does not have the gorilla glass like my old one so I am a bit nervous. No problems yet, it has been six months.
customer_reviews.author: Papaw Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very good performance and experience
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good cell phone, with an almost pure Android experience, although the little extras from Motorola are welcome. Very good pictures, quality performance against heavy video games and MotoMod always allow you to take the phone to another level. The battery life is quite good, although do not expect to spend days without having to recharge. You get a very good quality at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described sans SIM card but I already had one from my old phone. Oh, I can't wait for that 5G mod to become relevant in my area. Still, a solid smartphone with huge expandable external SD card slot. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have used Motorola phones since I have had cell phones, but I cannot recommend this one. After having it for only about a month, I set it on a table and the screen ruptured from within. I don't mean it cracked, I mean the liquid infiltrated the entire screen and took it out. Now I use an older Moto until I can buy another phone. It was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: dkesh

customer_reviews.title: Smartphone- smart ownership?
customer_reviews.text: I've had all of them- Nokia, Blackberry, Samsung, Iphone, Motorola. I still cant tell you why I've spent thousands on Samsung over the past 15 years vs just getting another Mot. I realize it's changed since the days of Richard and Startac but I am just as satisfied with this Z3
customer_reviews.author: mickel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, lots of nice features. Battery module extends operation time. No protection cases on market that fit over battery module while it's attached to phone. I've searched everywhere. Finger print reader on side is a bad location. Also no ear bud connection.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Stylish phone with useful battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Good value for last year's model Didn't use the fingerprint reader. Easy and safer to create a password. Phone is very thin without the mod. With the mod attached battery life is 30 hours. Best to leave the mod in the car and use it only when needed. Didn't try the other mods but the options seem very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Heifetz

customer_reviews.title: Ok phone .good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as I wanted to switch to Verizon from at&t. When I took it to the Verizon store. They said it wouldn't work. I figured that sucked but decided to take it to a different Verizon store and low and behold the person there said no problem and got it set up. phone is faster than the one I had and picks up the signal well. I've just had it for a couple of days but so far happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Extra battery adds more time to use.
customer_reviews.text: Extra battery adds more time to use. Downside is battery mod is not wireless.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heinen

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: my new phone works fantastic, the battery life is good, and even better with the included moto mod. The extended moto mod battery keeps it running for hours of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: By far a better bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I went from a galaxy s7 to the Motorola Z3. I also have the battery mod. I use my phone lot and was having to charge my Samsung twice a day. But with the extra battery mod , I'm set all day and night .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need to spend on a phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Not super fast, but Moto mods are cooler than any other phone. Screen and camera are are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Don't Overpay
customer_reviews.text: Love the Moto z3 I had the z2 and upgraded, but shop around I just paid 300$ for this last week fully unlocked with the extra battery mod.
customer_reviews.author: Redriot

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone so far. Love the fingerprint reader on the side makes it so much easier. Interface is easy, especially if you are used to Moto. Battery life would not be impressive without the battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: It's by far my favorite phone so far. I recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Troy L. Elliott Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone but wish it had a headphone jack instead of blue tooth
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The phone intermittently receivess calls. Seems to be that the phone is defective. Tried to contact Amazon and getttthe run around.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Esperaba más, vengo desde es g4,G5 plus
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone Ever, Motorola sucks, don't buy ir, save your money
customer_reviews.author: gilberto

customer_reviews.title: happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves her Moto phone so that makes my life good.
customer_reviews.author: Rfergie77

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent phone, extra thin and very powerful. I plan to buy another phone like this for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

product_meta.title: Motorola Z3 Play & Moto Power Pack - Unlocked (AT&T/Sprint/T-Mobile/Verizon) - 64GB - Deep Indigo (US Warranty) - PA9S0000US
product_meta.description: Goodbye smartphone, hello smartphone+ . Beyond the everyday. With moto z3 play, go all weekend with up to 40 hours of combined battery life just by snapping on a moto mod. Plus, get a virtually borderless display, dual depth-sensing cameras, and more. Connectivity - Wi-Fi - 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2.4 GHz + 5 GHz
feature_bullets: 6" Full HD+ Super AMOLED display with a Max Vision 18:9 aspect ratio, 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of internal storage with option to add up to 2 TB of micros expandable memory, and Android 8. 1
Qualcomm Snapdragon 636 1. 8 GHz octal-core processor, 850 MHz Adreno 509 GPU, and fast 4G LTE speed; Body: 6000 series polished aluminum frame
12 MP + 5 MP dual rear cameras for studio-quality portraits and 8 MP wide angle front-facing camera with screen flash
All-day battery + TurboPower charging: 3, 000 mAh battery, hours of power after minutes of charging with TurboPower charging
Use Moto Mods to turn your phone into a movie projector, boom box, battery powerhouse, and more
Instantly unlock your phone using fingerprint sensor or facial recognition

Unlocked for the freedom to choose your carrier. Compatible with AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, and Verizon networks. SIM card not included. Customers may need to contact Sprint for activation on Sprint’s network

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Quick Start Guide, Motorola Low Cost Battery Mod, Turbo Charger
